FCVT.L.D.description: Convert double-precision float to signed 64-bit integer
FCVT.L.D.comment: FCVT.L.D converts a double-precision floating-point number in floating-point register rs1 to a signed 64-bit integer in integer register rd. FCVT.L[U].D and FCVT.D.L[U] are RV64-only instructions.

FCVT.LU.D.description: Convert double-precision float to unsigned 64-bit integer
FCVT.LU.D.comment: FCVT.LU.D converts a double-precision floating-point number to an unsigned 64-bit integer. FCVT.L[U].D and FCVT.D.L[U] are RV64-only instructions.

FCVT.D.L.description: Convert signed 64-bit integer to double-precision float
FCVT.D.L.comment: FCVT.D.L converts a 64-bit signed integer in integer register rs1 into a double-precision floating-point number in floating-point register rd. FCVT.L[U].D and FCVT.D.L[U] are RV64-only instructions.

FCVT.D.LU.description: Convert unsigned 64-bit integer to double-precision float
FCVT.D.LU.comment: FCVT.D.LU converts a 64-bit unsigned integer to a double-precision floating-point number. FCVT.L[U].D and FCVT.D.L[U] are RV64-only instructions.

FMV.X.D.description: Move double-precision float bits to 64-bit integer register
FMV.X.D.comment: FMV.X.D moves the double-precision value in floating-point register rs1 to a representation in IEEE 754-2008 standard encoding in integer register rd. FMV.X.D and FMV.D.X do not modify the bits being transferred; in particular, the payloads of non-canonical NaNs are preserved.

FMV.D.X.description: Move 64-bit integer bits to double-precision float register
FMV.D.X.comment: FMV.D.X moves the bit pattern in IEEE 754-2008 standard encoding from the integer register rs1 to the floating-point register rd. FMV.X.D and FMV.D.X do not modify the bits being transferred; in particular, the payloads of non-canonical NaNs are preserved.
